Peace news

A man shot a neighbor in the garage because of the snow.

30.01.2024 14:43
According to the source, the incident occurred on the last Sunday. Men used to be scandalous because one of them sewed snow from their garage to the other doors.

Cause of the outbreak that frightened people It's a short circuit.

30.01.2024 14:02
The details of the incident were unknown, no victims were reported.

31 January: Afanasia Lomonosa Day

30.01.2024 13:37
This day is named in honor of Saint Afanasia of the Great, which was the Archbishop of Alexandria in the fourth century.

30.01.2024 12:39
According to the source, the accident occurred on the evening of 29 January in the area of Tver Boulevard.

According to the source, the incident occurred in the courtyard of the Zubov Boulevard.
